name: Nine
description: Never stop walking and try to stay alive, even a child should be able to do it
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: intel Core 2 duo 2.3 GHZ ou AMD Atlhon 64 X2 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GT 430 ou HD 4750 Storage: 750 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 530 ou AMD Phenom X3 8600 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTS 250 ou HD 6750 Storage: 750 MB available space
